works.description: The copyrighted work is an article on gender discrimination. Although a paragraph or two may have been removed from the beginning of the text on the infringing site, it's still clearly copied from our article.  This is just one portion of a larger problem; this writer has submitted many articles copied from our site. You can see them all at http://www.netarticledirectory.com/Author/56344/Batig-Nawong.html

The copyrighted work is an article on cease and desist orders. Although a paragraph or two may have been removed from the beginning of the text on the infringing site, it's still clearly copied from our article.
